name: The Biblical City of David in Unreal Engine 5
name_original: The Biblical City of David in Unreal Engine 5
description:
This project is a digital replica of the City of David made in Unreal Engine 5 modeling off of archeological sources and various showcase replicas. 

Here is a link to a video explaining the project as well as a time-lapse of the process building it from scratch.


Extra Controls
Shift/ Left Trigger - Sprint
1 / Up on D-Pad - Change time of day to Morning
2 / Left on D-Pad - Change time of day to Midday
3 / Down on D-Pad - Change time of day to Night
